NAME: English
COMMANDS_HELP_DESC_SETDJ: DJ 명령어를 실행할 수 있는 역할을 설정해요!
COMMANDS_HELP_DESC_SETTC: 명령어를 실행할 수 있는 채팅 채널을 설정해요!
COMMANDS_HELP_DESC_SETVC: 음악을 들을 수 있는 음성 채널을 설정해요!
COMMANDS_HELP_DESC_NODEINFO: 음악을 재생하고 있는 노드들의 정보를 확인해요!
COMMANDS_HELP_DESC_RELATED: 만약 다음 노래가 없으면 자동으로 추천 영상을 재생할지에 대한 설정을 하실 수 있어요!
COMMANDS_HELP_DESC_REPEAT: 전채 반복, 한곡 반복 등을 설정하실수 있어요!
COMMANDS_HELP_DESC_STOP: 현재 재생 중인 플레이어를 종료하고, 대기열을 초기화해요!
COMMANDS_HELP_DESC_VOLUME: 현재 재생 중인 노래의 볼륨을 조절해요!
COMMANDS_HELP_DESC_RELOAD: 명령어, 설정, 언어 등을 다시 로드해요! (제작자 Only)
COMMANDS_HELP_DESC_DELIVERY: 국내에 한해서 택배를 조회할 수 있어요!
COMMANDS_HELP_DESC_ALLIN: 현재 잔고를 모두 사용해 1/2 의 확률로 전 재산을 잃거나, 2배가 되어요!
COMMANDS_HELP_DESC_홀짝: 홀짝게임에 베팅하여 실패 시 베팅금을 잃고, 성공 시 베팅금액을 드려요!
COMMANDS_HELP_DESC_PAYDAY: 각종 확률형 도박을 즐길 수 있는 가상 재화를 받으실수 있어요!
COMMANDS_UTILS_LYRICS_NOTCORRECT: %EMOJI_BULB%  Search results are not correct! If result is not correct, try re-search with artist name!
COMMANDS_MONEY_BOT: %EMOJI_MONEY%  I think this user is a bot!
COMMANDS_MONEY_UNREGI: %EMOJI_MONEY% This user is not a registered user (not using %BOT_NAME_EN%)!
HANDLE_COMMANDS_DEFAULT_TEXT: %EMOJI_NO%  **%SERVER%** server can only use my command on channel <#%CHANNEL%>!
COMMANDS_MONEY_PAYDAY_LATER: %EMOJI_MONEY%  You are already used this command, Try again **%TIME%** minutes later
COMMANDS_CASINO_OTHER: %EMOJI_MONEY% Please finish using other gambling commands!
COMMANDS_CASINO_BET_HIGH: %EMOJI_MONEY%  You can't bet less ``10000`` %MONEY_NAME_EN%, please type ``%PREFIX%payday`` command to get %MONEY_NAME_EN%!
COMMANDS_CASINO_ALLIN_UNDER: %EMOJI_NO% You have %MONEY_NAME_EN% less than ``10000`` %MONEY_NAME_EN%. Please use the ``%PREFIX%money`` command to get %MONEY_NAME_EN%!
COMMANDS_CASINO_ALLIN_MONEY_ZERO: %EMOJI_NO% You have %MONEY_NAME_EN% equal to ``0`` %MONEY_NAME_EN%. Please use the ``%PREFIX%payday`` command to receive %MONEY_NAME_EN%!
COMMANDS_CASINO_ALLIN_START: %MEMBER% %EMOJI_MONEY% I'll start all-in! The odds are half! %EMOJI_MONEY% Press reaction in 15 seconds to start all-in!
COMMANDS_CASINO_ALLIN_SUCCESS_EDIT: %MEMBER% %EMOJI_MONEY% All-in success! Your balance has been doubled! %RANDMESSAGE%
COMMANDS_CASINO_ALLIN_RAND_FAIL: Attempt the following!| Maybe it might be..|It's okay..|Okay..|T.T...
COMMANDS_CASINO_ALLIN_FAIL_EDIT: %MEMBER% %EMOJI_MONEY% All-in failed. Your balance has been set to ``0``.. %RANDMESSAGE%
COMMANDS_CASINO_ALLIN_TIMEOUT: %EMOJI_NO% Timed out. Please try again with ``%PREFIX%allin``!
COMMANDS_CASINO_BET_INT: %EMOJI_MONEY%  Your bet is must be intger
AUDIO_LISTEN_PLEASE: > %EMOJI_NO%  Please turn on your listening status!
COMMANDS_AUDIO_STOP_OK: > %EMOJI_MUSIC%  The player has stopped and the queue has been cleared.
COMMANDS_AUDIO_SETDJ_SET: > %EMOJI_MUSIC%  I set up a role as a DJ ``%DJNAME%``
COMMANDS_AUDIO_SETDJ_NONE: > %EMOJI_MUSIC%  I set up a role as a DJ **NONE**
COMMANDS_AUDIO_SETTC_SET: > %EMOJI_MUSIC%  I set up a command channel %CHANNEL%!
COMMANDS_AUDIO_SETTC_NONE: > %EMOJI_MUSIC%  I set up a command channel **NONE**!
COMMANDS_AUDIO_SETVC_SET: > %EMOJI_MUSIC%  I set up a voice channel %CHANNEL%!
COMMANDS_AUDIO_SETVC_NONE: > %EMOJI_MUSIC%  I set up a voice channel **NONE**!
COMMANDS_AUDIO_PLAY_ADDED_SINGLE: > %EMOJI_MUSIC%  Added **%TRACK% [%DURATION%]** to the queue at position **%POSITION%**
COMMANDS_AUDIO_PLAY_PLAYLIST_ADDED_PLAYL: > %EMOJI_MUSIC%  Found playlist with **%NUM%** entries, added to the queue!
COMMANDS_AUDIO_PLAY_PLAYLIST_ADD_ASK_PLA: > %EMOJI_MUSIC%  This track has a playlist of **%NUM%** tracks attached. Will you load playlist?
COMMANDS_AUDIO_PLAY_NO_VOICE_ME: > %EMOJI_MUSIC%  First, please add me your voice channel!
COMMANDS_CHANGELOG_NO: > %EMOJI_NO%  Developers have changed the log do not exist to commit! **(%COMMITSHA%)**
